altTitles.ja: 彼女召喚しました!?

description.en: Yuta Agatsuma is a high school student who has never experienced first love. He doesn't know how to fall in love, but his classmate Nodoka Kanzaki is someone who makes him interested. Is this love!? Meanwhile, his younger sister named Yoru, who dreams of summoning demons, is performing her summoning ritual as usual. At that time, the summoning circle suddenly shines and a girl descends from the sky... She is Wrath, a demon from the demon world, and she offers Yuta a contract...!? A thrilling 7-way love comedy where cheating = the end of the world begins!
description.es-la: Yuuta Agatsuma es un estudiante de secundaria que nunca ha experimentado el amor. No sabe lo que es enamorarse, pero está interesado en su compañera de clase Kanzaki. ¿Esto es amor? La hermana menor de Yuuta, Yoru, que sueña con invocar a un demonio, está llevando a cabo su habitual ritual de invocación. De repente, un círculo mágico se ilumina y una chica desciende del cielo… Ella es Raas, un demonio, ella proviene del mundo de los demonios, y le ofrece a Yuuta un cierto contrato… Comienza una comedia de amor de 7 teams, en donde un engaño puede desatar el fin del mundo.

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsziedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.ja: ノゾ×キミ
ノゾミとキミオ

description.en:
Suga Kimio finds himself hiding in the girls locker room, unable to move or escape the situation as the girls in his school crowd in. Although he originally had no ulterior motives, he found himself panicking as he heard the girls coming in and hid in a locker. Komine Nozomi, one of the shy girls in his class finds him, but surprisingly covers for him. Perplexed but glad, Kimio goes home.  
  
Later that night, he gets a text from Nozomi who happens to live across the way on the same floor of the complex they both live in. She blackmails him into agreeing to show each other’s bodies when she texts him. Kimio has to abide by Nozomi’s insane demands or risk ruining his school life so they both start their little peep show through each other’s windows…  
  
Nozo x Kimi: 2-nensei-hen is the second season of the series, but continues the chapter count from the previous magazine.  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16241)

altTitles.ja: ギャルせん

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

description.en:
Tang San was a talented apprentice to the great Tang Sect. Due to mastering the forbidden Tang arts, he was pressured to jump off a cliff and died. However, he was reborn into another world filled with Essence Spirits. At the age of six, every person will have their essence spirit awoken. Spirits can take many forms: weapons, plants, and animals; They can help people with their daily lives. Outstanding spirits can be trained to engage in combat. A spirit master is the soul and heart of the Combat Continent! When Tang San turns six, a huge surprise awaits him. His peaceful life in this new world will change completely.

Note: After the original chapter 344, it continued on from a re-written 322.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com naturalidade.

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิสต์พันธุ์ปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 青のエクソシスト
青の祓魔師

description.en: This world consists of two dimensions joined as one, like a mirror. The first is the world in which the humans live, Assiah. The other is the world of demons, Gehenna. Ordinarily, travel between the two, and indeed any kind of contact between the two, is impossible. However, the demons can pass over into this world by possessing anything that exist within it. Satan may be the king of demons, but there's one thing he doesn't have, and that's a substance in the human world which is powerful enough to contain him! For that purpose he created Rin, his son with a human woman, but will is son agree to his plans? Or will he become something else…? An exorcist?
description.fr: Ce monde se compose de deux dimensions jointes en une seule, comme un miroir. Le premier est le monde dans lequel vivent les humains, Assiah. L’autre est le monde des démons, la géhenne. Habituellement, voyager entre les deux, et même tout type de contact entre les deux, est impossible. Cependant, les démons peuvent passer dans ce monde en possédant tout ce qui existe en son sein. Satan est peut-être le roi des démons, mais il y a une chose qu’il n’a pas, et c’est une substance dans le monde humain qui est assez puissante pour le contenir ! Dans ce but, il a créé Rin, son fils avec une femme humaine, mais le fils acceptera-t-il ses plans? Ou va-t-il devenir autre chose...? Un exorciste ?
description.tr: Dünya, ayna gibi birbirine zıt iki farklı boyuttan oluşmaktaydı: İnsanların yaşadığı Assiah ve iblislerin hüküm sürdüğü Gehenna. Bu iki boyut arasında iletişim ve seyahat mümkün olmamasına rağmen iblisler, insanların ruhlarını ele geçirerek Assiah'a ulaşabiliyorlardı.İblislerin tanrısı Şeytan, kendisini barındırabilecek kadar güçlü bir insan bulamadığı için Gehenna'da sıkışıp kalmıştı. Bunu aşmak için, bir insan kadınından Okumura Rin adında bir çocuk sahibi oldu.Şeytan'ın oğlu, babasına yardım edecek mi, yoksa başka bir şeye mi dönüşecek? Bir ruh kovucuya mı?
description.uk: Дві сторони однієї монети, два виміри, які є віддзеркаленнями один одного - саме з них і складається всесвіт. Перший – це наш матеріальний світ, Ассія. Другий – це світ демонів, Геєна. За звичайних обставин ні подорож, ні який завгодно контакт між ними є неможливим. Проте демони можуть перетнути кордон, у що-небудь вселившись. Сатана - повелитель демонів і король Геєни, жодна жива душа в Ассії не здатна довго витримувати його присутність. І щоб створити сильне вмістилище, він зачав сина з людською жінкою, Ріна. Але чи погодиться Рін з його планами? Чи може все ж захоче стати кимось іншим?.. Екзорцистом?
description.pt-br: Este mundo consiste em duas dimensões unidas como uma só, como um espelho. O primeiro é o mundo em que vivem os humanos, Assiah. O outro é o mundo dos demônios, Gehenna. Normalmente, viajar entre os dois e, na verdade, qualquer tipo de contato entre os dois, é impossível. No entanto, os demônios podem passar para este mundo possuindo qualquer coisa que exista dentro dele. Satanás pode ser o rei dos demônios, mas há uma coisa que ele não possui: uma substância no mundo humano que seja poderosa o suficiente para contê-lo! Para isso ele criou Rin, seu filho com uma mulher humana, mas será que seu filho concordará com seus planos? Ou ele se tornará outra coisa...? Um exorcista?

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

altTitles.ja: 新婚だけど片想い

description.en: A seemingly perfect looking newlywed couple but the affection is one-sided.
description.ja:
キミのこと、絶対オトしてみせるんだからーー! 
才色兼備なJK・皐月は、親の都合で婚約することに。相手は高校生囲碁棋士・久遠。 
イケメンで才能もある久遠との婚約で人生順風満帆…と思いきや、彼は超・塩対応男子だった!! 
部屋には立入禁止の赤札、皐月のモテテクもまるで通じず…そんな難易度の高い久遠を攻略し、二人にラブラブ新婚生活が訪れる日は来るのか!? 
くやしいけれど、きゅんとする! 完璧JKと塩対応囲碁男子の新婚生活ラブバトル、スタート!

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.en: Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme

description.en: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"

“You have to become a villain to live? … But how do you do that?” One day, Da-jeong Kim, an ordinary Korean office worker who suddenly possesses the world of a novel. In fact, it is Christine Rosalind, the villain character who dies at the beginning of the novel in the series that she possessed. Perhaps because of Da-jeong’s possession, the original death is avoided, but that is only temporary. In a few moments, you die, and when you die, you return to the starting point of your life. How can I live without dying? The sky throws a clear answer to Da-jeong, who is in trouble. let her be a villain When she becomes a villain she can live without dying. … By the way, can she become a villain that only eats her heart? “A world collapsing, twisting characters. If you want to live, you have to remember who you are.” She said she could only live if she was a villain, did she mean that she could only live? After many twists and turns, she heard the voice of a villain, but Da-jeong’s life is hard and painful. It turns out that Christine was born into a civilization of ‘dead or bad’. Unexpected characters appear in front of Da-jeong, who is in such trouble. Raymon Myers, who is the man of the original story and is a perfect match for Christine, Diane Schneider, who was not found in the original, but has a reputation as a vicious witch in the world, and Cordelian Parker, who was possessed by the original author, the female lead of the original and the creator of this world. The three of them approach Da-jeong with different goals…

altTitles.ja: 影技 SHADOW SKILL

description.en: Gau Ban is a boy who is struggling to become a "Sevalle," the strongest class of warrior in the mercenary kingdom of Kuruda. Gau's elder sister, Elle Ragu, is the 59th "Sevalle" and holds the honorable title of "Shadow Skill." The story develops around the two siblings, as they fight magical monsters and historical warriors. The major part of it is a battle called "Shadow Skills" that is fought with only the hands and feet. It begins when the historical warriors chant the words "We are invincible!" and obtain superhuman powers.

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

description.en: Cheoldu, a barbarian raised on Earth, lives a mundane life with his best friend Jintae. But when he sees an alien creature from his planet on the news, everything changes. Thrown into an apocalyptic challenge, Cheoldu and Jintae must adjust their lives in Nova, a savage world filled with goblins and ogres. Will the two conquer Nova’s perils and uncover the secrets that could change Earth’s fate? An epic tale of friendship, survival, and untamed adventure awaits.

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」

日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.vi: Thời hiện đại trong câu chuyện này là thời đại của "đa dạng" giống loài, những chủng tộc bán nhân có một tên gọi mới là"Genjin" và sống cùng nền văn minh con người. Yukata Shinsou, 1 học sinh năm nhất cao trung bình thường quyết dịnh nhập học vào một ngôi trường tư thục có tỉ lệ Genjin cao nhất nước để tránh mặt những người bạn sơ trung của mình. Và rồi cậu gặp được Tsumiki Ogami, một cô nàng Genjin dạng người sói, và cô ấy sẽ dẫn cậu tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung đầy màu sắc!
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en:
In a distant place, on a certain mountain, a young dragon has been captured by a beautiful female tiger. The two, who were predator and prey, begin a journey to find a way for two animals with very different life spans to live by each other's sides.

TL;DR: Tiger Woman x Dragon Boy

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

altTitles.ja: グラップラー刃牙完全版

description.en:
"If someone is born a male, at least once in his life he'll dream of becoming the strongest man alive. Grappler, the martial artist who aims to become the strongest in the world!"

That is the dream held by the Grappler, Baki Hanma.

The mysterious, young, martial artist aspires to follow in his sinister father's footsteps as the world's strongest creature. But to what lengths will Baki go?

We follow the young grappler as he matures in a world full of extremely powerful fighters and how he overcomes all obstacles in order to face his father one day in the fighting ring.

When he arrives at an underground martial arts tournament, Baki is put to the test from fighters all over the world. Will he overcome all odds and become the champion of the underground arena?!

Newly Re-edited, this edition of Grappler Baki features new cover art and color pages.

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

description.en: This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.

[Reads Left-to-Right]

It's a very common occurrence.

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: 男子だと思っていた幼馴染との新婚生活がうまくいきすぎる件について

altTitles.en: Regarding my Married Life with a Childhood Friend Whom I Thought Was a Boy Going Way Too Smoothly

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống hôn nhân của tôi và "Thằng Bạn"

description.en: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!
description.ja:
親友だから、通じ合えちゃう。

高校生の秀一は、男だと思っていた幼馴染の唯華といきなり結婚することになってしまう。10年ぶりの再会に、最初はぎこちなかったが徐々に昔を思い出して――。楽しい高校生活と新婚生活を満喫しちゃう!?

意識しあっても、あと一歩が踏み出せない。
description.pt-br: Shuichi, um estudante do ensino médio, acabou se casando com seu amigo de infância que ele pensava ser um menino. Em seu reencontro após 10 anos, sua amiga de infância Yuika se transformou em uma linda garota, o que inicialmente deixou Shuichi bastante nervoso. No entanto, com o passar do tempo, ele gradualmente se acostumou com a sensação de proximidade como melhores amigos - e assim começa a história de amor deles como um casal ideal com um toque encantador de inocência!

title.en: Isekai de Café wo Kaiten Shimashita

altTitles.en: Opening a Café in Another World

altTitles.zh: 在异世界开咖啡厅了哟

altTitles.ja: 異世界でカフェを開店しました。

altTitles.fa: ایسکی د کافه ای کیتن شیماشیتا.

altTitles.th: เปิดร้านคาเฟ่ที่ต่างโลก

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界開咖啡廳了哟

description.en: Kurokawa Lisa is an ordinary office worker, who has practiced lots of cooking while living alone. One day, she wakes up in another world, with a concerned little spirit hovering over her! She has apparently been transported to a magical, spirit-filled realm by the will of the goddess, and there is no known way for her to go back. She is taken in by a wealthy couple, and they and her new spirit helper treat her with nothing but kindness. There is one problem, however–the food in this magical world is gross! Lisa insists on helping the household cooking staff prepare a traditional meal from her world, and it is a big hit with her hosts. Soon Lisa knows what she should do in this new world; she should open a café and treat everyone to delicious food!

The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.
description.ru: Крестьянин по имени Ханбэй делает предложение руки и сердца девушке по имени Охару, однако она признаётся, что влюблена в другого парня, Масакити, живущего в соседней деревне. Когда Ханбэй отправляется на поиски Масакити, чтобы сразиться с ним, он обнаруживает, что тот умело обращается с мечом, несмотря на то, что он тоже крестьянин. Во время их схватки они слышат крик тонущей девочки, которая просит о помощи, после чего вдвоём бросаются на помощь, в процессе чего погибают в бурном потоке реки. После смерти оба парня оказываются в той самой, всем хорошо знакомой комнате.

title.ja: Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakama Tachi Ni Dungeon Okuchi De Korosare Kaketa ga Gift 『Mugen Gacha』 De Level 9999 No Nakama Tachi Wo Te Ni Irete Moto Party Member To Sekai Ni Fukushu & 『Zamaa!』 Shimasu!

altTitles.ja: 信じていた仲間達にダンジョン奥地で殺されかけたがギフト『無限ガチャ』でレベル9999の仲間達を手に入れて元パーティーメンバーと世界に復讐&『ざまぁ!』します!

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakamatachi ni Dungeon Ouchi de Korosarekaketa ga Gift "Mugen Gacha" de Level 9999 no Nakamatachi wo Te ni Irete Moto Party Member to Sekai ni Fukushuu & "Zamaa!" Shimasu!

altTitles.en: Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

I Was Almost Killed By The Teammates I trust Inside A Dungeon, And Gained A Gift Called [Infinite Gacha] And Level 9999 Comrades, And Now I'll Take Revenge Against My Former Teammates And The World, That's What You Get!
Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

altTitles.vi: Bị Phản Bội Bởi Đồng Đội Và Sở Hữu [Gacha Không Giới Hạn] Lv.9999
Bị Đồng Đội Phản Bội Và Bỏ Rơi Ở Sâu Trong Hầm Ngục. Nhưng Với Kỹ Năng "Gacha Vô Hạn", Tôi Có Được Những Đồng Đội Cấp 9999 Và Sẽ Trả Thù Đồng Đội Cũ Lẫn Thế Giới!

description.en:
There are six races in this world: human, beast, dragon, elf, dwarf, and demon. Humans are discriminated against and looked down on as the most inferior race. The "Gathering of Races" was a party with members from each race gathered to dispel such discrimination, but they also had a hidden purpose. They were ordered by the non-human countries to search for the human "Master," and take it to their own country.

Light, a human boy with the gift "Infinite Gacha," was welcomed into the Gathering of Races as he was suspected of being a Master. But in the end, their investigation showed that Light was not a Master. Just as Light was about to be killed by his teammates, he accidentally stepped on a transfer trap and was teleported to the lowest level of the dungeon.

In the deepest dungeon, he was attacked by a mythical level 1000 demon. In a desperate situation, Light used "Infinite Gacha" repeatedly. Luckily, he draws the SUR level 9999 card "Mei the Seeker Maid." Mei helped Light repel the demons and saved his life.

After finally escaping from the crisis, Light decides to take revenge on his former comrades. Mei advises him to remain in the dungeon and use Infinite Gacha to increase his number of trustworthy friends. Light agreed began building up the power necessary to oppose the non-human nations.

Three years later, Light had built the strongest nation in the depths of the dungeon. Once again, he will return to the surface to take revenge on his former comrades and search for the truth that nearly killed him.
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10040/episode/345702)
description.ja:
仲間に裏切られ、最凶のダンジョン『奈落』の底に突き落とされた少年・ライト。彼に残されたのはゴミだと思われたスキル『無限ガチャ』のみ！　最悪な状況から少年の逆転劇が始まる!!!　

9つの種族の平等を掲げ結成された冒険者パーティー『種族の集い』。荷物持ちの少年・ライトは、パーティーの仲間達に裏切られ最凶ダンジョン『奈落』の奥で命を狙われる…。絶体絶命の危機、ライトがすがるのは恩恵『無限ガチャ』!!!
description.vi: Một thế giới mà loài người bị coi là một loài thấp kém. Wright, một cậu bé con người đang mang hành lý tại buổi thám hiểm các chủng tộc,cậu đã bị phản bội đày sâu bên trong ngục tối chết chóc nhất thế giới "Naraku" ,ba năm trôi qua kể từ đó. Bản thân Light cũng trở thành cấp 9999, cậu muốn sống để trả thù lũ đồng đội khốn nạn đã bỏ mặc cậu
description.pt-br: Um menino chamado Light é traído por seus companheiros e mergulha no abismo da masmorra mais perigosa do mundo. Tudo o que ele têm é a Bênção (habilidade) "Gacha Infinita", que ele pensou ser um lixo! Começa a vingança de um garoto na pior situação possível!

title.en: 30-sai made Doutei de Itara Mahou Shoujo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 30歳まで童貞でいたら魔法少女になりました

altTitles.en: I Was a Virgin Until I Was 30 so I Was Turned Into a Magical Girl

description.en:
"When you are a virgin until you are 30, you will become a wizard." A famous joke around the Internet… is what I thought, but to think that it actually happened to me!

Wait, but this isn't a wizard? Eh? Magical girl? Why?

Comedy manga about magical girls who used to be old virgin guys!

---

[Alternative Niconico raws](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39350)

The person who is ranked No.1 in the world rankings of the AOS League of Infinity game and the strongest person who is nicknamed the devil on the battlefield.
However, a man wearing a golden mask appeared before the strongest person who had suffered a setback in a traffic accident and was abandoned by everyone and proposed.
“If I come back, can I become a world championship winner?”
The strongest person who goes back to the past becomes the maestro who leads the battlefield between earth and other worlds and shows the best game of all time.
description.id:
Orang yang merupakan peringkat No. 1 di peringkat dunia game AOS League of Infinity dan orang terkuat yang dijuluki iblis di medan perang.
Namun, seorang pria bertopeng emas muncul di hadapan orang terkuat yang mengalami kemerosotan dalam kecelakaan lalu lintas dan ditinggalkan oleh semua orang dan mengajukan lamaran.
“Jika saya kembali, bisakah saya menjadi pemenang kejuaraan dunia?”
Orang terkuat yang kembali ke masa lalu menjadi maestro yang memimpin medan perang antara bumi dan dunia lain dan menunjukkan permainan terbaik sepanjang masa.

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

altTitles.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade
Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

altTitles.es-la: Detrás de la sonrisa de la reina superviviente

altTitles.th: เบื้องหลังรอยยิ้มของเจ้าหญิง

altTitles.zh: 活下来的王女的笑容背后

description.en:
When the king offers Aerik Cladinae his own sister's hand in marriage for his meritorious deeds in battle, he didn't expect to get saddled with a limping, drooling woman like Miesa Esquillre.

Driven insane by her brother's physical and psychological torture, Miesa rolls around on the ground, spills food all over herself, and screams unintelligebly as a way of communicating. But sometimes, Aerik catches a flash of shrewd understanding behind those vacant eyes.

Is Miesa truly as mad as everyone thinks... or is she hiding something?

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

title.en: Kiraware Majo Reijou to Dansou Ouji no Kon'yaku

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女令嬢と男装皇子の婚約

altTitles.en: The Engagement of the Disgraced Witch and the Cross-Dressing Princess

altTitles.vi: Hôn Ước Của Phù Thủy Bị Ruồng Bỏ Và Công Chúa Cross-dressing

altTitles.es: El compromiso de la bruja deshonrada y la princesa travestida

altTitles.vi: Cuộc đính hôn giữa Nàng phù thủy bị ghét bỏ và Cô công chúa giả nam

altTitles.th: การหมั้นหมายของยัยเจ้าหญิงแต่งชายกับคุณหนูแม่มดผู้ถูกชิงชัง

altTitles.zh: 万人厌的魔女大小姐与男装皇子的婚约

altTitles.zh-hk: 萬人厭的魔女大小姐與男裝皇子的婚約

altTitles.zh-ro: Wàn rén yàn de mónǚ dà-xiǎojiě yǔ nánzhuāng huángzǐ de hūnyuē

altTitles.ru: Помолвка презираемой ведьмы и переодетой принцессы

altTitles.ko: 미움받는 마녀 영애와 남장 황자의 약혼

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Shadow Gaiden

altTitles.zh: 想要成爲影之實力者-沙雕小劇場

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！ しゃどーがいでん

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Shadow Side Story
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Shadow Side Story

description.en:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!
When Yoshihiko becomes Host Yoshi, his whole personality changes. Nakane likes "Yoshi" but can he love Yoshihiko?

altTitles.ja: ポジティブぼっちハルミちゃん

description.en: Fuyu Nagai has a fear of being alone. She tries to smile and join the group, but it doesn't go well. So, she follows Harumi Kita, popular girl, and discovers a secret -  Her true self is a "Bokuchimitsu"…

A lonely girl finds solace in her bag full of memories; now it's time for her to break through her shell.

Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title.en: Everyday Life with a Succubus Slave

altTitles.ja: サキュバス奴隷との日常

description.en: A girl with a love who happens to be from a long time ago.
description.pt-br: Uma pequena história de amor, de um deus da guerra que aquece um coração que teme o frio do outono.

altTitles.ja: 出会って5秒でバトル

altTitles.th: ศึกเดือด 5 วิพลิกชะตา

description.en:
It was just a usual morning.  
  
Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), is suddenly dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and have gained certain powers."  
  
Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, a new era of intelligence battle of begins!

title.en: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen shite Yatta

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染彼女のモラハラがひどいんで絶縁宣言してやった 〜自分らしく生きることにしたら、なぜか隣の席の隠れ美少女から告白された〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen Shite Yatta ~Jibun Rashiku Ikiru Koto ni Shitara, Naze ka Tonari no Seki no Kakure Bishoujo kara Kokuhaku Sareta~

altTitles.en: I’m Sick and Tired of My Childhood Friend’s, Now Girlfriend’s, Constant Abuse so I Broke up With Her
I Dared Declare Goodbye To My Emotionally Abusive Childhood Sweetheart

altTitles.vi: Quá mệt mỏi với việc bị con bạn thuở nhỏ kiêm bạn gái bắt nạt, tôi đã chia tay với em ấy

description.en:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore.

So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option.

And thus, the story of my break up begins…
description.pt-br: Minha amiga de infância também é minha namorada. Um sonho realizado, certo? De jeito nenhum, ela me insulta diariamente, ela destrói minha dignidade e isso afeta meu bem-estar mental, não aguento mais. Então não tenho escolha, terminarei com ela. Para manter minha sanidade, é a única opção.

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

description.pt-br: A bela e alegre assalariada Ayaka está loucamente apaixonada por sua veterana no trabalho, Hiroko! Duas colegas de trabalho apaixonadas que pensam que a outra é hétero estão totalmente apaixonados uma pela outra...

description.en: Whenever Kurumi is sad and wishes she was more brave, she looks at her fairy tale book. One day, a "Coppelia" called Chestnut comes out of her book, saying she came from the fairy world through a portal created by Kurumi's strong desire. But now that Kurumi has a Coppelia, she's expected to fight others in battles where the loser ends up undressed.

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

The Murim Warring States period is where only the strong survives. This is the war slave Cheong Gwang and Myeong-Wol’s Murim Survival Story.

강자만이 살아남는 무림전국시대.
전쟁노예 천광과 중원제일의 기생 명월의

description.ru:
Главный герой - Чон Гван, будучи ребенком, попадает в военное рабство. Больше десяти лет он не видел своего отца и сестренку. Согласно уговору с преемником одной из сильнейших гильдий, он должен принести голову двадцати мастеров боевых искусств, и только тогда ему даруют свободу. Чон Гван жил мыслью о скором возвращении домой, однако... его обманули. Тогда он решает сбежать...

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!
